title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn! Secret Bullet
original_name: 家庭教師ヒットマン REBORN！隠し弾〈シークレット・ブレット〉
sinopse:
Each novel contains several short stories, many of which were originally serialized in Jump Square; however, each novel also contains at least one new story (the titular story), specially written for the novel.

(Source: Katekyo Wikia)
